      • getListener

        public javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener getListener()

      • onChange

        protected void onChange()
        Called when the change listener is invoked.

        Rebind all path components coming after the path component of this listener and update destination value.

        Must be called when the actual value of this listener changes, as from that moment on all listeners of subsequent listeners are listening for changes on the wrong object.

      • unbind

        protected void unbind()
        Unbind the listener from its value.
